attributes.action: Opposition to the petition 'For Vets to reduce all their costs to promote animal welfare'
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to support the great work the vet industry does and if by a miracle the e-peition 'For Vets to reduce all their costs to promote animal welfare' gets enough signatures that it is rejected as it rightly should be, and perhaps make an example of the kind of opinion that is the basis of the aforementioned petition. Those kind of petitions and that kind of narrowmindedness is detrimental to the industry and will have major implications for adequate care and welfare for animals/pets.
